summary: To fight for custody of his daughter who loves playing the piano, a steel factory worker decides to forge a piano from scratch.
cast: Qianyuan Wang|Yongzhen Guo|Shin-yeong Jang|Qian Liu|Qian Liu|Xingyu Liu|Er-yang Luo|Hailu Qin|Yu Tian|Yue Wang|Zaolai Wang|Yan Xiang|Jiangning Xu|Huizhi Zhang|Yaxi Zhang|Kui Zhou
title: Gang de qin
